What does the CSS property 'display: none;' do?
Which CSS property is used to change the font size of text?

questions.answer: Controls how the element's size is calculated
options: Controls how the element's size is calculated

questions.question: What is the CSS pseudo-class used to style a link that has been visited?
Which CSS property is used to change the text color of an element?

questions.answer: The order of priority for styles
options: The order of priority for styles

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to specify the space outside an element's border?
What does the 'CSS specificity' determine in CSS style rules?
Which CSS property is used to control the text alignment within an element?
What is the purpose of the 'clearfix' class in CSS?
questions.answer: To clear floated elements and prevent layout issues

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to control the order of overlapping elements?

questions.answer: To apply styles based on the device's characteristics
options: To apply styles based on the device's characteristics
